title: R.L. Stine’s ‘Fear Street’ Coming to the Big Screen
text:
R.L. Stine’s ‘Fear Street’ Coming to the Big Screen 
Published By: Slashfilm.com - Today 
Following in the footsteps of Goosebumps, R.L. Stine‘s other hit series from the 1990s will also be coming soon to a theater near you. A ... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
